metadata.title: CVE-2021-22179 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions before 12.2. GitLab wasvulnerable to a SSRF attack through the Outbound Requests feature.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
